    • Brawler

      public Brawler(String name, int health, int damage, int attribute_id, int level, int pos, Brawler.attributeTime a, String pircture_url)
      Brawler Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - brawler name
      health - brawler health
      damage - brawler damage
      attribute_id - unique attribute id
      level - brawler level
      pos - line up position between 0 and 4
      a - attribute time enum, BATTLE, SELL, or BUY
      pircture_url - direct url for picture

      public Brawler addBrawler(int id, int health, int damage, boolean alive, String name, int attribute_id, int pos, Brawler.attributeTime a)
      Add a brawler to the DB
      Parameters:
      id - brawler id
      health - brawler health
      damage - brawler damage
      alive - is the brawler alive or faint
      name - brawlers name
      attribute_id - brawlers attribute id
      pos - brawlers line up position
      a - brawlers attribute time enum, BATTLE, SELL, BUY,
      Returns:
      The added Brawler
